messages.message:
Bumping this announcement - we're super excited to finally launch E2E runtime configs and secrets! *This was a highly requested feature by our customers and applies to any customer that:*
• Validates extracted results against data in 3rd party systems
• Pushes extracted data into downstream systems a using custom function downstream integration
• Needs to pass in and work with custom metadata (like application IDs, claim IDs, config files, etc.) in clean/validation/downstream custom functions
If you have a customer that has any use case above, we would love to hear your feedback on this feature and have your help testing to catch any bugs/issues ahead of GA :pray:

To help you get started, we've include demo videos below (huge thanks to @Jessica!):
• Secret management demo video:
    ◦ https://instabase.zoom.us/clips/share/nFF9o66UTkWO102-P1liOQ
    ◦ Passcode: $6=q!Zw4
• Build
    ◦ https://instabase.zoom.us/clips/share/H_hPxE8IRrKkNobhL6drPA
    ◦ Passcode: Zx6q^eF%
• Apps/deployments
    ◦ https://instabase.zoom.us/clips/share/hlRSWRy1Th6iPt7Tb7Km9g
    ◦ Passcode: 6fWaL&.m
Can't wait to hear your feedback!

Super cool feature! FYI I love the effort put into these videos @Jessica, it makes a big difference for trying to digest a new feature and if I get asked about this I can even just share a video to a customer
Planning on testing a bit next week
